QuestData.Title: Solid as a Rock
QuestData.Description: Cenarius requires me?$b$bI shall depart as soon as I am able, but I mustn't leave while my druids are in danger. A vile harpy coven has emerged and seeks to claim my grove as their own.$b$bThese vermin inflict a petrifying disease which, given time, will destroy the infected.$b$bWhile I wish for all of my followers to be cured, it is crucial that my elder disciples survive to protect the grove in my absence.$b$bIf you would assist us, find my disciples and rouse them from this terrible state.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Marnor Lorleaf, Erwind Mistfen and Del'thanar Sagewood.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you roused my disciples, traveler?
QuestData.RewardText: Your arrival was a blessing, friend.$b$bAnde'thoras-ethil.
